(Simplified: 帼)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 國 indicates the sound; 巾 (cloth) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 巾 [ jīn ] cloth, curtain, handkerchief, towel
    • 國 [ guó ] country, nation, state; national
①古代婦女的頭巾、帕：巾幗英雄(女英雄)。
(Simplified: 帼)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 國 indicates the sound; 巾 (cloth) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 帼

Original meaning 本义: Meaning women's headgear.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 巾幗英雄 jīn guó yīng xióng (heroine)

幗字的基本解释

幗
guó
见“帼”。

幗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guó］
［《廣韻》古獲切，入麥，見。］
［《廣韻》古對切，去隊，見。］
亦作“蔮1”。“帼1”的繁体字。
妇女覆于发上的饰物。参见“巾幗”。

幗字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幗； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页336第05
【唐韻】【集韻】古獲切【韻會】郭獲切【正韻】古伯切，?音蟈。【說文】婦人首飾。【玉篇】?也，覆髮上也。【晉書·宣帝紀】諸葛亮數挑戰，帝不出，因遺帝巾幗婦人之飾。　又【廣韻】婦人喪冠。　又【海篇】亦作蔮。【釋名】蔮恢也，恢郭，覆髮上也。魯人曰頍，齊人曰幌。【後漢·輿服志】夫人紺繒蔮。　又【唐韻】【韻會】古對切【正韻】古外切，?音〈巾貴〉。義同。　【玉篇】或作簂。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guó］
["Guangyun" is cut in ancient times, enter the wheat, see you. ]
["Guangyun" ancient cut, go to the team, see you. ]
Also known as "蔮1". "帼1" in traditional characters.
Women's accessories covering their hair. See "women".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帼; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 336 No. 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Gu Huoqie [Rhyme Meeting] Guo Huoqie [Zheng Yun] Gu Boqie,? [Said the text] Women's jewelry. [Jade articles]? Yeah, I will post it again. [Book of Jin·Xuan Emperor Ji] Zhuge Liang challenged the number, but the emperor couldn't come out because of the decoration of the wife of the emperor.　[Guang Yun] The woman lost her crown.　[Hai Pian] is also used as 蔮. [Release name] Sui Hui Ye, Hui Guo, Fu Sang Ye. The people of Lu called 頍, the people of Qi called Por. [Later Han·Yufuzhi] Mrs. Cyan.　[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ancient opposite cut [Zheng Yun] Ancient outer cut,? Sound "Furniture Expensive". The same meaning.　【Jade articles】Or make bamboo.
